item.description:
Let's enjoy the outdoors this time. The Liberty Hotel now has an outside area called "The Yard" which has comfy outdoor furniture in groupings just right for our gathering. [Access is from the west stairs on the 2nd floor. Turn left at the top of the escalator, the descend the stairs; the Yard is on your left.]
Table service and a bar menu is available. We will discuss all the campaigns this fall, areas for action, and any other areas of interest to those who appreciate and defend traditional American values and process. There will be a documentary movie at 7:30, "Forgotten Ellis Island" and free popcorn. If the weather is not conducive to outdoor activities, we will gather at the upstairs bar, in the area by the south window.


THURMAN SMITH
781-781-9386
cell 617-571-3740
item.name: Monthy gathering
